text: Kristjan Bendra (born January 30, 2006) is a Slovenian footballer. He plays as defender for the Austrion 2nd league club FC Liefering. == Career == Bendra began his career at ATSV Vorwärts Steyr. In April 2014 he moved to SK Vorwärts Steyr. In February 2020 he moved to FC Red Bull Salzburg. He went through all age levels in the academy from the 2020/21 season on. For the 2024/25 season Bendra moved into the squad of the farm team FC Liefering. FC Liefering Homepage He made his debut in the 2nd league in August 2024 . He came on as a substitute for Leandro Morgalla at halftime on the first matchday of that 2024-25 season against First Vienna FC. FC Salzburg Wiki == International == Bendra played for a Slovenian youth national team for the first time in April 2022. He took part in the European Championship in 2023 with the U-17 team. Slovenia was eliminated from the tournament in the group stage. Bendra played in all three games. == References == Category:2006 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian footballers Category:FC Liefering players
